item.title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Zarichchya, Leonivka of Chernihiv region, Oleksiyivka, My... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Zarichchya, Leonivka of Chernihiv region, Oleksiyivka, Myropillya of Sumy region, Veterynarne, Vovchansk, Potykhonove of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Bochkove, Uspenivka, Khrypuny of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Chasiv Yar, Klischiyivka, Dyliyivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff ... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Chasiv Yar, Klischiyivka, Dyliyivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Vyyimka, Rozdolivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviatio... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Vyyimka, Rozdolivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Yampolivka, Rozdolivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka, Umanske, Netaylove of Donetsk region, - General Staff... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka, Umanske, Netaylove of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Bleshnya, Hremyach of Chernihiv region, Kucherivka, Sosni... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Bleshnya, Hremyach of Chernihiv region, Kucherivka, Sosnivka, Marchykhyna Buda of Sumy region, Kudiyivka, Strilecha, Pletenivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Neskuchne of Sumy region, Kruhle of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: Explosions were reported in Odesa region (LiveUAMap)
item.description: Explosions were reported in Odesa region
